mapper.select: SELECT rnum,k_no,k_title, u_id,u_nick, k_view, k_replycnt, k_solutionyn, k_code, c_name FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY k.k_replycnt DESC, k.k_view) AS rnum, k.k_no,k.k_title, u.u_id, u.u_nick, k.k_view, k.k_replycnt, k.k_solutionyn, k.k_code, (SELECT c_name FROM code WHERE c_code = UPPER(k.k_code)) AS c_name FROM knowfit k INNER JOIN userInfo u ON k.u_id = u.u_id) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 4
